# NexusWeb3

**Custom AI systems that replace expensive SaaS.**

We build autonomous AI agents, dashboards, and automation tools for businesses that want to stop renting software and start owning it.

### What We Do

- AI agent systems (sales, support, content, operations)
- Custom dashboards and real-time analytics
- Workflow automation and API integrations
- Multi-chain token security scanning
